manual.title: User manual
manual.teacherAssignmentsText: Basic information about active assignments, submitted assignments, and assignments after the deadline can be found on the ,,Overview" subpage. To view detailed information about individual assignments, click on the desired assignment. If you want to see all assigned tasks, go to the ,,Assignments" subpage.
manual.teacherCreateAssignmentText: To create a new assignment, on the ,,Assignments" subpage, click on ,,Create new assignment" in the top right corner. Then, fill in all the fields, enter a set of examples that will be part of the assignment, and create the assignment by clicking ,,SAVE".
manual.teacherResultsAssignmentText: To view students results, go to the ,,Results" subpage and select the assignment for which you want to view the results. To export the results in CSV format, click on ,,DOWNLOAD CSV" in the bottom right corner.
manual.teacherImportText: To insert new examples, go to the ,,Files" subpage and then select the folder containing the examples. The examples must be in TEX format and compressed into a ZIP folder.
manual.studentAssignmentsText: The basic information about active assignments, submitted assignments, and assignments after the deadline can be found on the ,,Overview" subpage. To view detailed information about individual assignments, click on the desired assignment. If you want to see all assigned tasks, go to the ,,Assignments" subpage.
manual.studentAssignmentElaborateText: After entering the assignment, you will see the individual examples of the assignment. You can work on the examples by clicking on ,,TAKE" next to the assignment. To input special characters, a keyboard with special characters will appear when you click on the input field.
manual.studentHistoryText: To view completed assignments, go to the ,,Assignment History" subpage. Assignments are divided into completed assignments and unfinished, uncompleted assignments.
